item.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - 46I04
item.description:
Nov 15, 18:52 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/11/2022 18:01 UTC
End Time : 15/11/2022 18:44 UTC
Service impact : vRack was temporarily unavailable for rack 46I04.
Public network was also unavailable from 18:30 UTC to 18:37 UTC.
Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 15, 18:30 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/11/2022 18:01 UTC
Service impact : vRack is temporarily unavailable for rack 46I04
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
